content:
You're welcome! I'm glad I could help. The Fanatics NBA Jersey Shadow Box Case is an excellent choice, and the UV protection will definitely give you peace of mind knowing that your signed Curry jersey is well-protected.

Remember to check the product reviews on Amazon to ensure that you're getting the best product for your needs. And don't hesitate to reach out if you have any more questions or need further recommendations.

Once you receive your shadow box case, I hope you'll enjoy displaying your signed Curry jersey proudly! It's a great way to showcase your passion for the NBA and your admiration for Steph Curry.

If you have any other sports memorabilia or collectibles, feel free to reach out for advice on how to display them as well. I'm always here to help.

Thanks again for chatting with me, and I hope you enjoy your new shadow box case!
